name: "Zombie Country: Greetings with Zombie Neighbors"
description:
Children's and youth associations and movements are an important part of society in many countries of the world. They help young people find their place in life, develop as individuals and learn to cooperate with other people.

In Europe, there are a large number of children's and youth associations and movements that promote the ideas of tolerance, equality and democracy. For example, in Germany there is an organization called "Jugendfeuerwehr", which teaches children and young people about fire safety and helps them develop as leaders. In France, there is a children's movement "Scouts et Guides de France", which promotes the formation of moral values and teaches young people to work in a team.
